detail_desc: Blouse in a viscose weave with a small, lace stand-up collar, button placket and lace section at the top. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.
Short dress in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, boxy jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem.
Crêpe top with a small stand-up collar, opening at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Leggings in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement with an all-over print, elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with lined, lace-trimmed triangular cups. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Knee-length skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High, elasticated waist and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with a wide, square neckline and a smocked back. Short sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the hems, and smocking at the front of the hem.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a gathered, elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
5-pocket trousers in slightly stretchy washed twill with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the front.

Cotton parka with a high collar, shoulder tabs with a button, a zip with concealed fasteners down the front and a drawstring at the waist. Decorative zip at one side, flap front pockets and sleeve pocket with a button, adjustable tab and button at the cuffs and elastication at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted vest tops in organic cotton jersey.

Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reinforced palm sections and reflective details. Elastication and an adjustable tab and plastic fastener at the wrists (sizes 2-10Y with a hook and loop tab) and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The gloves have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Trousers in a lightweight weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, visible seams, side and back pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in airy mesh and a pair of trousers in jersey. Round-necked T-shirt with a trim around the neckline. Knee-length shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs.
A-line dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave. Square neckline front and back with narrow, covered elastication at the top and flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted T-shirts in soft, stretch jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and wide elastication at the waist.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.

Corset in lace and mesh with adjustable suspenders at the bottom. Underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Kangol x H&M. Oversized jumper in a soft, wide rib knit containing some wool with a fuzzy finish. Round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a large Kangol logo above the hem.

Lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the hem. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Jersey playsuit in a patterned cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps, side pockets and an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a suede flap, concealed magnetic fastener, narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 5.5x16.5x22 cm.
Bikini bottoms and a long-sleeved swim top in UV-protective fabric. Patterned top with a small stand-up collar. Bottoms with a flounce at the waist and a lined gusset. UPF 50.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey.
Shorts in soft, Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has a tie detail at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short, wide legs.
Calf-length silk skirt with a waistband.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist and frills at the front. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with appliqués, and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide elastic hem. No fasteners.
Pyjamas in soft, printed jersey. Top with a round neckline, long sleeves and rounded hem with slits in the sides. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and dolman sleeves.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Short dress in woven fabric with short cap sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt with box pleats for added width.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves.
Straight trousers in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Jumper a soft, waffle-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with embroidery, a small stand-up collar, V-neck at the front with thin, twisted ties and wide sleeves with a seam at the top.
Windproof gloves in thermal fleece with reinforced palms, a hook and loop tab at the wrists, a strap at the top and reflective details.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hi tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Imitation suede sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel and braided jute trim around the sole. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform height approx. 5 cm.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour press-stud placket and ribbing.
Short dress in an airy weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with narrow ties at the front, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in light sweatshirt fabric with a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Satin hairband with a decorative tie detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Dressing gown in soft, patterned fleece with a jersey-lined hood and tie belt at the waist.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, opening and button at the back of the neck and a frilled seam at the waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Top in soft, airy slub jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Straight-cut shirt in an airy viscose weave with a collar, V-neck opening and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, gently draping twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
